meanings.sent1: The anural lizard scurried across the sand.
meanings.sent2: The anural cat purred contentedly on the windowsill.
meanings.sent3: The anural puppy tried to wag its invisible tail.
meanings.sent4: The anural bird soared gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent5: The anural fish swam swiftly through the water.

meanings.sent1: The anural snake slithered silently through the grass.
meanings.sent2: The anural horse galloped freely in the field.
meanings.sent3: The anural squirrel tried to balance on a branch with no tail.
meanings.sent4: The anural kite flew high in the sky without a tail.
meanings.sent5: The anural kangaroo hopped effortlessly without a tail.

meanings.sent1: The anural rabbit hopped quickly into its burrow.
meanings.sent2: The anural fox stealthily approached its prey.
meanings.sent3: The anural bear tried to scratch an itch on its back with no tail.
meanings.sent4: The anural airplane soared through the clouds without a tail.
meanings.sent5: The anural dolphin swam gracefully in the ocean without a tail.
